properties.name: Integration type
properties.description:
Enter the Module integration types for test. supported types are - malware
Note : Remove type which you don't want to test.

Enable Module Integration and use in the WF targets
1. Import the WF which has the Module integration targets and Verify Error Message when Integrations targets are no enabled
2. Enable the below Integration.
    a. Microsoft Intune
    b. Splunk Cloud
